entry.title: Dlux Pro Glue Plastic Trays
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dlux
Type: Application Products & Tools
Price: 0.00 - 2.95 (3 variants)

Dlux Pro Glue Plastic Trays

 

Size: 16 holes or 31 holes

 

Dlux Professional Glue Trays are the perfect option for Artists who want to keep their glue fresh. By placing adhesive in the small holes you limit contact with air thus increasing the lifespan of your glue dot. Available in two sizes and disposable after each well has been used.

Dlux Pro Lash Lift Hook

 

Size : 141mm x 12mm

 

This tool will help you apply your lashes to silicone shields during a Lash Lamination/Perm.  The fine end will help you guide lashes to natural position while also separating them during adhesive application to the lash shield.

entry.title: Dlux Professional Keratin Botox Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dlux
Type: Lash Lift
Price: 59.95

Dlux Professional Keratin Botox Serum

20ml

Dlux Professional Canada is proud to offer the newest innovation to Lash Lifting! Take your lash lifting to thicker and more dramatic results with the use of Dlux Professional Keratin Botox Serum.

This hydrolyzed keratin mask strengthens and nourishes natural lashes with Argan oil, proteins, keratin and vitamins. The nourishing mask fills the natural lash with keratin making your natural lashes thicker, fuller and longer. They will appear longer and curled without any risk of damage from the perming solution.  Eyelashes will actually become stronger from this added treatment during your lash lifts. 

Eyelash hair consists 96% of Keratin. Dlux Lash Botox consists mostly of hydrolyzed keratin ( decreased into such a small particles so it has access to the thinnest lashes) and collagen- which is a natural nourisher.

Dlux Professional Keratin Botox Serum can be used as an added step to ANY Lash Lifting system on the market and will help your clients reach new lifting potential. By adding Lash Botox to your lift treatments you can now tell clients confidently that they are making their lashes HEALTHIER by having this added benefit. Dlux Professional Keratin Botox Serum will also promote natural growth and will help your clients in time get longer natural lashes. 

 

 

How To Use:

Lash Botox is to be applied after you have permed and set the lashes. If you choose to tint lashes Lash Botox would be applied after tint has been completed.

 

 Apply a small amount of Keratin Lash Botox to both shields being sure to coat the lashes base to tip. Let sit for 5-10 minutes. Remove using a micro swab.  The lashes will start to slightly detach from the shield during the treatment due to the nourishing oils in the keratin treatment.  This is expected and is okay since your final step after the keratin treatment will be to remove the lashes from your shield/rod. 

 

Warnings:

Keep out of reach of children.

Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes.

In case of contact rinse with plenty of water.

If irritation occurs, discontinue use.

Store at room temperature and avoid direct light.

External use.

Serum should be used within 12 months from

opening.  

Perform the tolerance test.

Product not indicated for use on persons under the age of 18.

Do not use during pregnancy and / or lactation.

entry.title: CLEARANCE Dlux Pro Gourd Natural Lash
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dlux
Type: Eyelashes
Price: 17.95

Dlux Professional Gourd lashes are the newest innovation in Flat Lashes.  Due to their shape and material they are softer and silkier than standard flat lashes.  The split tip also gives the lashes a more textured appearance helping the lash line look fuller.  

Dlux Professional Gourd Natural Lashes are precision manufactured from sterilized PBT materials from Korea and have a deep, solid black finish.  Through precision manufacturing, our lashes retain their curl beautifully!  

 

Number of rows in a box: 12
Thickness:              0.15 mm
Curl Type:               C or D
Mixed Lengths:      8-14mm

entry.title: Dlux Pro Hydrogel Lint Free Eye Pad (20 pair pack)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dlux
Type: Application Products & Tools
Price: 18.95

Dlux Pro Hydro Gel Lint Free Eye Pads (20 pair pack) Best Selling item! New and improved shape! 

Thickness: medium thickness
Shape: Crescent Shape (Type C) 
20 pairs/pack


Dlux Pro Hydrogel Lint Free Eye Pads are used to isolate lower lashes during the lash extension procedure.  They do not shift around once applied to the skin.  These patches contain Hydrogel which can hydrate the sensitive skin below the eyes.  

**Eye gel pads are for clients who have no sensitivity/ allergy to latex.  Use 3M tape for clients who are sensitive.

entry.title: Authentic 5/45-7 Dumont Curved Tweezer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dumont
Type: Tweezer
Price: 76.95

Authentic 5/45-7 Dumont Curved Tweezer

Lash For Less is happy to carry the best authentic hand made Swiss tweezers. Made with Inox steel these tweezers are light weight, won't strain, and have expert grip and control. Dumont tweezers are made of stainless steel, making them resistant to corrosion and high temperatures. There tweezers are the highest in lash standards and you can immediately feel the difference hand made perfection makes.

  Disclaimer : We do not recommend soaking tweezers in cleaning solution due to risk of corrosion. Disinfecting wipes are better suited for tweezers. If you must soak tweezers please do so for the shortest time allowed and allow to air dry. Dlux and LFL are not responsible for corrosion of tweezers due to improper use of cleansing solutions.  

THIS ITEM IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNT CODES.  Return Policy: In order to be eligible for return or exchange Dumont Tweezers must be shipped back in original packaging. (Plastic tip and box) if not returned in original condition this product will not be eligible for refund or exchange.

entry.title: Dlux Pro Lash Wrist Wrap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dlux
Type: Application Products & Tools
Price: 14.95

Dlux Pro Lash Wrist Wrap

  • Black
  • 1 pc in 1 pack

 

Are you a lash artist who prefers to work off the back of their wrist?  The DLux Professional Lash Wrist guard allows for a strip to be at your reach without being contaminated by skin contact.  Also helps the strip to maintain it adhesive backing in order to be put back into a tray if necessary.

entry.title: Dlux Pro Extreme Long Lash & Volume Mascara
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dlux
Type: Aftercare and Retail
Price: 7.95 - 59.95 (2 variants)

Dlux Pro Extreme Long Lash & Volume Mascara

  • Lengthening, Volumizing
  • This mascara has perfectly engineered ingredients and innovative stretch technology. Which help extend  and separate the thinnest, shortest, and hard to reach lashes.
  • OIL FREE

 

This mascara is formulated to be safely used with eyelash extensions. It will not break down adhesive bond. For clients currently wearing eyelash extensions it is recommended only for use with bottom lashes. Not to be applied onto lash extensions.

entry.title: Dlux Professional Anti Allergy Gel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dlux
Type: Application Products & Tools
Price: 39.95

Dlux Professional Anti Allergy Gel

Dlux Professionals Anti Allergy Gel is able to absorb and eliminate the hazardous substances in the air that are a result of curing adhesive.  Through a chemical reaction hazardous substances such as Formaldehyde (HCHO) and Acetaldehyde  (possible byproducts from ALL Lash Adhesives exposure to air) are converted to Aldehyde Oxime and Water.  This amazing technology is patented by Dlux Professional in 6 Countries, with even more patents pending. 

This Technology is able to protect both clients and technicians from possible harmful fumes. Also deodorizes. 

Anti Allergy Gel is not guaranteed to assist clients with sensitivity issues or allergies.  Its purpose is to help protect Artists and Clients from air pollutants and to minimize fumes from curing adhesive. 

Instructions: Open jar and place near adhesive stone.  Leave open for entire Lash Application procedure. Jar is good for 3 months (approx 300 hours) Once gel has shrunk and dried up it is ready for replacement.

 

 

 

80mL
